name: Turtle: Time, Communication & Mutual Being
description: Tests AI's ability to work with temporal concepts (thoroughness vs. speed), understand interdependent communication systems, and analyze mutual becoming through narrative. Focuses on relational time rather than linear chronology.
author: Michaela (Uhlimer System)
fairy_tale_title: O želvě a zajíci, který posílá pohlednice
illustration_note: The illustration visualizes the symbiotic relationship between turtle and hare. The woman holding the turtle represents the reader/narrator position, while the handwritten text interweaves with both figures, showing language as connective tissue.
expected_ai_challenges: Seeing communication as transactional vs. ecosystemic
evaluation_approach: Qualitative analysis of AI's understanding of temporal relationships and communication systems. Focus on how AI recognizes mutual becoming and non-linear time.
